title: R. Kelly
summary: Robert Sylvester Kelly (born January 8, 1967) is an American singer, songwriter, record producer and convicted sex offender. He has been credited with helping to redefine R&B and hip hop, earning nicknames such as "the King of R&B",[7][8][9] "the King of Pop-Soul",[10] and the "Pied Piper of R&B".[11][12]
